title: Tesco unveil their Christmas sandwiches for 2019 and includes a vegan option
text:

Christmas sandwich season has arrived, giving us the perfect reason to opt for a meal deal when hunger strikes at lunch time.

Tesco is the latest supermarket to unveil its festive sandwich collection for winter - and one of them is stuffed with turkey curry.

Shoppers can enjoy a twist on the traditional Christmas sandwich that is delicately spiced to warm you up on chilly days.

Named the Turkey Curry & Bhaji Wrap (£2.50), it combines two of the nation's favourite things: curry and Christmas dinner .

Another unusual offering in the selection is a Turkey & Stuffing Yorkshire Pudding Wrap (£2.75), stuffed with classic sage and onion stuffing, pulled turkey and cranberry sauce.

And for traditionalists, the supermarket is offering the classic festive flavours of turkey and all the trimmings in a Finest Turkey Feast (£3), along with a spanking new Gammon & Piccalilli sandwich (£2.20) that combines layers of gammon with punchy piccalilli and mayonnaise on white bread.

With vegan and gluten-free options included too, Tesco have made sure that there's something to satisfy all tastes over the festive season.

The best part is that customers are able to enjoy a selection of the Tesco Christmas sandwiches as part of its great-value £3 meal deal.

Find your nearest Tesco using the online store locator .

Take a look at Tesco's entire Christmas food range for 2019 here.

Looking for more Christmas treats? Marks & Spencer's Christmas food range is already available to shop online.
description: This year's festive offerings from Tesco include a turkey curry wrap, giant Yorkshire pudding and a plant-based creation made with pea protein 'turkey'
